items.question: How do I create a support ticket?
items.answer: Go to <#1407818322703290532> and select the appropriate category from the dropdown menu. You can only have one active ticket at a time.

items.question: How long does it take to get a response?
items.answer: Our support team typically responds within 24 hours. For urgent matters, we aim to respond within a few hours during business hours.

items.question: Can I have multiple tickets open at once?
items.answer: No, you can only have one active ticket at a time. Please close your current ticket before opening a new one.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards through Stripe, including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express. All payments are secure and encrypted.

items.question: How do I get my purchase after payment?
items.answer: After successful payment, you'll receive a direct message with your download link and license key (if applicable). Downloads are available for 24 hours.

items.question: Can I get a refund?
items.answer: Yes, we offer refunds within 7 days of purchase. Open a refund ticket in <#1407818322703290532> with your order details.

items.question: What types of plugins do you develop?
items.answer: We develop custom Minecraft plugins for Spigot, Paper, and other platforms. From simple utilities to complex systems - we handle projects of all sizes.

items.question: How does the development process work?
items.answer:
1. Open a Plugin Development ticket
2. Describe your requirements
3. Receive a custom quote
4. Pay deposit (if required)
5. Development begins
6. Testing and delivery

items.question: Do you provide support after delivery?
items.answer: Yes! We provide 30 days of free support and bug fixes after delivery. Extended support packages are also available.

items.question: What building styles do you offer?
items.answer: We specialize in Medieval, Modern, Fantasy, and Futuristic builds. Our team can adapt to any style or theme you have in mind.

items.question: What's included in a build commission?
items.answer: Complete builds include the structure, interior design, landscaping, and a world download. We also provide screenshots and a brief description.

items.question: Can you work with existing worlds?
items.answer: Absolutely! We can integrate new builds into your existing world or modify existing structures to match your vision.

items.question: How does the VIP system work?
items.answer:
VIP levels are based on total spending:
🥉 **Bronze** - Default
🥈 **Silver** - €100+ spent
🥇 **Gold** - €200+ spent
💎 **Diamond** - €500+ spent

items.question: What benefits do VIP members get?
items.answer: VIP members enjoy priority support, exclusive discounts, early access to new products, and special recognition in the community.

items.question: How can I check my VIP status?
items.answer: Use the `/profile` command to see your current VIP level, total spending, and purchase history.
